00067   static unsigned int makeBoardID(const short crateID, const short slotID, const short boardComponentNumber) 
00068   {
00069     return BoardID(crateID, slotID, boardComponentNumber);
00070   };

00072 
00076   FeConfigurationBlock(int boardID) {
00077     obj()->setIntVal( kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId , boardID  ) ;
00078     //Initialize the Flags Field otherwise its content can float around
00079     obj()->setIntVal( kFeConfBlockIntValFlags , 0  ) ;
00080     //Initialize Values which are used only for the emc data 
00081     //to prevent them from floating around in case we fill hcal data
00082     obj()->setIntVal( kFeConfBlockIntValEmcBot, 0);
00083     obj()->setIntVal( kFeConfBlockIntValEmcTop, 0);
00084     obj()->setIntVal( kFeConfBlockIntValEmcBotLowGainBit, 0);
00085     obj()->setIntVal( kFeConfBlockIntValEmcTopLowGainBit, 0);
00086   };
00087 
00090     FeConfigurationBlock(LCObject* obj) : LCGenericObjectImplExt(obj) 
00091     { 
00092       assert ( _obj->getNFloat() == 0 );
00093       assert ( _obj->getNDouble() == 0 );
00094       assert ( _obj->getNInt() == kNFeConfBlockIntValues );
00095     } 
00096 
00097 
00099   FeConfigurationBlock &  setCrateID(short crateID)
00100   {
00101 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00102     assert((crateID & 0xffffff00) == 0)
00103 #endif
00104     obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId,getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId) | (crateID << 16));
00105     return *this;
00106   };
00107 
00109   short getCrateID() const {
00110       return (short) ( (getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId) >> 16) & 0xff);
00111   };
00112   
00114   FeConfigurationBlock &  setSlotID(short slotID) 
00115   {
00116 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00117     assert((slotID & 0xffffff00) == 0)
00118 #endif
00119     obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId,getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId)| ((slotID & 0xff) << 8));
00120     return *this;
00121   };
00122 
00124   short getSlotID() const {
00125       return (short) ( (getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId) >> 8) & 0xff);
00126   };
00127   
00128 
00130   FeConfigurationBlock &  setBoardComponentNumber(short componentNumber) 
00131   {
00132 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00133     assert((componentNumber & 0xffffff00) == 0)
00134 #endif
00135    obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId,getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId)| (componentNumber & 0xff) );
00136     return *this;
00137   };
00138 
00140   short getBoardComponentNumber() const {
00141       return (short) (  (getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValFeBoardId) & 0xff) );
00142   };

00282   FeConfigurationBlock &  setDacData(int top_value, int bottom_value) 
00283   {
00284 
00285     unsigned int comb= ((((unsigned int) top_value) & 0xffff) << 16) 
00286                       | (((unsigned int) bottom_value) & 0xffff); 
00287     obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValDacData,(int) comb);
00288     return *this;
00289   };
00290 
00292   int getDacDataTop() const
00293   {
00294     return (int) (((unsigned int) getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValDacData)) >> 16);
00295   };
00296 
00298   int getDacDataBottom() const
00299   {
00300     return (int) (((unsigned int) getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValDacData)) & 0xffff);
00301   };

00319   FeConfigurationBlock &  setEmcVfeInfo(int vfeInfo, int iBot, int
00320   iTop, int iBotLowGainBit, int iTopLowGainBit) {
00321      obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValVfeInfo,vfeInfo);
00322      //In principle this is information which does not change very often 
00323      //But if we're store the user interface is immune against a sudden change
00324        obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValEmcBot,iBot);
00325        obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValEmcTop,iTop);
00326        obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValEmcBotLowGainBit,iBotLowGainBit);
00327        obj()->setIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValEmcTopLowGainBit,iTopLowGainBit);
00328    return *this;};
00329 
00331   int  getVfeInfo() {return getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValVfeInfo);};
00332 
00335   int emcVfeBottomEnable (int chip) {
00336 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00337     assert (chip < 6);
00338 #endif
00339     return  static_cast<bool> ( ( (getVfeInfo() & 0xfff) >> (chip+6) ) & 0x1);       
00340 
00341   }
00342 
00343 
00344   int emcVfeTopEnable (int chip) {
00345 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00346     assert (chip < 6);
00347 #endif
00348     return static_cast<bool>( ( (getVfeInfo() & 0xfff) >> chip ) & 0x1);       
00349   }
00350 
00351   bool emcVfeLowGainBottom () {
00352     return static_cast<bool>( ( (getVfeInfo() & 0xffff) >> getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValEmcBotLowGainBit) ) & 0x1);       
00353   }
00354 
00355   bool emcVfeLowGainTop () {
00356     return   static_cast<bool>( ( (getVfeInfo() & 0xffff) >> getIntVal(kFeConfBlockIntValEmcTopLowGainBit) ) & 0x1);       
00357   }
